name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Python Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in developing robust applications, specializing in **Python**, **Django**, **AWS**, **CI/CD**, and **Kubernetes**. My technical expertise includes designing and implementing **REST APIs** and **GraphQL** services, alongside effective database design and SQL utilization. I have a solid foundation in design patterns such as SOLID and DRY, risk mitigation strategies, and automated testing methodologies, ensuring code quality through rigorous **code reviews** and **test strategies**. I am adept at managing technical debt and fostering compliance with industry standards.

In addition to my technical skills, my proficiencies in **Git**, mentorship, and strong communication capabilities have enabled me to lead teams effectively.  Experienced in collaborating on projects involving event-driven architectures and microservices, I am passionate about leveraging technology to drive innovation and efficiency in the development process.
